Title: Enacts the "NY B.O.W. act"
Summary: Enacts the "NY B.O.W. act"; authorizes the New York state energy research and development authority to administer a program to provide funds related to enabling clean wind projects.
LawCode: Amd ยง1854, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to authorizing the New York state energy research and development authority to administer a program to provide funds related to enabling clean wind projects
